Key Match Events: LeBron James scored 11 straight points as part of a 21-0 run in the fourth quarter
LeBron James recorded a triple-double with 32 points, 14 rebounds, and 10 assists
Anthony Davis hit a 3-pointer to give the Lakers breathing room
Anthony Davis made the game-winning free throw after LeBron James signaled for silence
Post-Match Reflections: Lakers coach JJ Redick praised LeBron James' performance
LeBron James chose to stay with the Lakers despite being a free agent
The Lakers secured their first 3-0 start since the 2010-11 season
Miscellaneous Highlights: The game was down by seven entering the fourth quarter
Sacramento scored 33 points in the fourth quarter but fell short
